sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed today, March 6, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.
Please adhere to posted hours. Buck’s Run last day is Sunday, March 9, 2025.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Upper loops.  Wide power tilled and track set this am on 2 inches fresh. Rare twigs and 2 grey spots on blue loop. Deep snow in woods.  Very good skating conditions.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Hi All!The HM website states that it will be groomed today. After the last two days of warm rain, I didn't have high hopes, but apparently there's enough to groom.If anyone skis there today, please post a report on the overall conditions, especially the connector trail and the far loop, which always seem to deteriorate the soonest. Thank you!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Daily through this Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Nicer conditions return to Nub's Nob today following a couple inches of fresh snow and cooler overnight temperatures. The ski surface is a variable mix of granular snow and windblown powder, and the grooming turned out pretty well last night. The forecast is calling for a high just below freezing with wind out of the west. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
